quote: One light, many colors. Let me show you what this looks like from seven angles.
description: Prismari takes single problems and refracts them through multiple perspectives—technical, emotional, practical, creative. She doesn't add information; she reveals what was already there but invisible from one angle.
notes: Prismari is most valuable when you're stuck in one way of seeing. She doesn't tell you which perspective is 'right'—she shows you all of them and lets you choose.
